Precautions for heart diseases

We should change our everyday lives at the cost of staying healthy. Here are some habits YOU can start with:
Eating a healthy and balanced diet
Becoming more physically active
Make your weight, a healthy weight
GIVE UP SMOKING
GIVE UP ALCOHOL
Keep your blood pressure under control
Keep your diabetes under control (if you have diabetes)
Keep your heart rate under control
Take any and all prescribed medications (only the daily amount given by your doctor)
